meanings.definition: A group of individuals who are considered to be at the highest level of society or a particular field.
meanings.sent1: The superelite of the town always attended exclusive events.
meanings.sent2: She was born into the superelite and lived in a mansion.
meanings.sent3: The superelite decided to have a picnic in the park, causing a stir among the locals.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, she was the superelite, shining brighter than the rest.
meanings.sent5: The superelite were like royalty, commanding attention wherever they went.

meanings.definition: A person who belongs to the highest social or economic class.
meanings.sent1: Being a superelite meant having access to the best schools and clubs.
meanings.sent2: The superelite often vacationed in exotic locations around the world.
meanings.sent3: The superelite threw a lavish party that left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a superelite when she walked into the room, heads turning to look at her.
meanings.sent5: The superelite were the envy of many, living a life of luxury and privilege.
